author: mmusich
body:
fixes #32822 

#### PR description:

   * Addresses https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/32822. 
   * Removed `TrackerGeometricDetESModule` from xml writers as discussed [here](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/32361#discussion_r534080377).
   * Profited of this to  `CondDB_cfi` in lieu of `CondDBCommon_cfi` (deprecated)
   * Since 2019 geometry does not exist in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/tree/master/Configuration/Geometry/python I've removed the corresponding scripts.

#### PR validation:

All executable scripts run to completion now.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

No backport needed.
title: Fix CondTools/Geometry scripts
